pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SnowflakeThe Snowflake generator done right.See [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snowflake_ID) for additional information.### RequirementsPython 3.7 and above. No additional dependencies.### Installation`pip install snowflake-id`## Usage### Using generator```pythonfrom snowflake import SnowflakeGeneratorgen = SnowflakeGenerator(42)for i in range(100): val = next(gen) print(val)```#### Output:```text68206985751698227216820698575169822722682069857516982272368206985751740170246820698575174017025...```### Parse snowflake id```pythonfrom snowflake import Snowflakesf = Snowflake.parse(856165981072306191, 1288834974657)print(f"{sf.timestamp = }")print(f"{sf.instance = }")print(f"{sf.epoch = }")print(f"{sf.seq = }")print(f"{sf.seconds = }")print(f"{sf.milliseconds = }")print(f"{sf.datetime = }")```#### Output:```textsf.timestamp = 204125876682sf.instance = 363sf.epoch = 1288834974657sf.seq = 15sf.seconds = 1492960851.339sf.milliseconds = 1492960851339sf.datetime = datetime.datetime(2017, 4, 23, 15, 20, 51, 339000)```### Load generator state```pythonfrom snowflake import SnowflakeGenerator, Snowflakesf = Snowflake.parse(856165981072306191, 1288834974657)gen = SnowflakeGenerator.from_snowflake(sf)for i in range(100): val = next(gen) print(val)```#### Output:```text14149346531364495361414934653136449537141493465313644953814149346531364495391414934653136449540...```
